messages.title: My pledges to you
messages.content: If elected, Lisa Forbes pledges to tackle the Cost of Living Crisis, Protect Local Services, Save the NHS, Make Immigration Fair, and fight for More High Skilled Jobs.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: I'll Tackle the Cost of Living Crisis
keyPolicies.policyDescription: Lisa Forbes will vote to cap energy bills, raise the minimum wage to £8, and scrap the Bedroom Tax.
Will fight to ensure Peterborough gets better funding for local services.
Relies on local NHS services like everyone else in Peterborough and fighting for our Local Services will be a priority.
Will vote to stop the undercutting of British workers and the exploitation of migrant labour that's used to drive down wages.
Will fight for investment in manufacturing and skills to build our local economy and give our young people good local jobs.

issues.economy: Lisa Forbes will vote to cap energy bills, raise the minimum wage to £8, and scrap the Bedroom Tax to tackle the Cost of Living Crisis.
issues.governance: Will fight to ensure Peterborough gets better funding for local services.
issues.health: Relies on local NHS services like everyone else in Peterborough and fighting for our Local Services will be a priority.
issues.immigration: Will vote to stop the undercutting of British workers and the exploitation of migrant labour that's used to drive down wages.

housing.content: Lisa Forbes will vote to ... scrap the Bedroom Tax.

leaflet.personalStatement: I'm standing to be your MP because we need more people who have lived real lives representing us in Westminster.

images.caption: Lisa Forbes was in your local area today

leaflet.additionalNotes: Leaflet promoted by Matthew Clemens on behalf of Lisa Forbes both at 121 Park Road, Peterborough, PE1 2TR. Printed by Anton Group Limited, Anton House, Christy Way, Laindon, Essex SS15 6TR.
